title: How to get my music on Spotify - Quora

response.answer_text: Getting music from Spotify has become quite an easy with the help of Wondershare iMusic manager Software. With iMusic software you can download Spotify playlist or a single song in just single click. You need to copy the URL of the song or album or playlist from Spotify and then paste it in the download box of iMusic manager software. Hit the download button and you will be prompted with selection of songs from the playlist. Select all the songs you want to download and click OK. All the songs will be then saved to your PC in next couple of minutes. iMusic is the best music manager and downloader software that allows you to get all kinds of songs from 3000+ music websites. So, what are you waiting for? Get your favorite song from Spotify now!

If "your" music means music you have created / you own the copyrights on (or a license) then you can use one of the many distribution services to get your songs distributed to Spotify and other online music platforms.
